SEARCH
Package Graph

Class Edge

java.lang.Object
Graph.Edge
public class Edge extends Object
This class is responsible for defining an edge and its properties - source node, destination node, pheromone level, and weight.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Edge(Node node1, Node node2, int weight)
    Constructs an edge between two nodes with the specified weight.

    • containsNode

      public boolean containsNode(Node node)
      Checks if the edge contains the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to check
      Returns:
      True if the node is equal to either of the two nodes in the edge
